channel.title: tea on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in tea on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Japan is lovely in some regards
item.description: 21:14 Tuesday 25 August 2015 JST I bought a carton of peach tea and a carton of milk tea. I drank the milk tea and left peach tea on the table, in public, but out of sight of the shop staff. Two+ hours later, I came back and it was still on the table. I mean, it’s not like Grand Central, but there’s a fair stream of people who come through here.
